description: Baked eggs in avocado boats are a simple but delicious way to start the day, perfect served with sourdough toast for dipping.
name: Avocado Baked Eggs Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Pre-heat the oven to 200Â°C. Make a small well in each avocado half (depending on the size of the stone) and crack an egg into each.
Scrunch up foil and place on a baking tray. Nestle each egg filled avocado half in the foil to keep them upright. Season the eggs and bake for 12-15 minutes.
Serve each avocado half with a drizzle of sriracha and chives on top, with buttered sourdough toast on the side for dipping.
